website_summaries.verdict: An affordable tray that's both stylish and simple to use and store.
pros: 3-tier serving tray available with bowls or flat trays
Collapsible design allows for simple storage
Thin metal poles are aesthetically pleasing but also surprisingly sturdy
Plain white design fits almost any table setting
Tray sits at an affordable price point
cons: You may have to avoid putting heavy items on the very top tier

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Had a party and it was perfect, all my friends wanted to play with and wanted to know where I got it. Definitely thinking Christmas gifts this year!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Used these for my seafood bar at my housewarming! They looked so fancy and easy to store. LOVE them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Great value
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I can honestly say I'm surprised. I was half expecting this to be flimsy for only $10 and was pleasantly surprised. The bowls themselves seem quite sturdy, it's easy to use and store, it seems like it could bear a fair amount of weight. I know the metal stems holding the bowls look flimsy but when I place my hand on the top bowl and added pressure (like a pound or 2) it still felt solid. I will update if I need to but I dont think I will. I may buy a 2nd one as a gift
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Zinn

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy great item
customer_reviews.text: This item is really great, I think I will be ordering another one. It was a nice size, and I expected to have to fiddle with the wires to get them to fold but you just twist the top bowl and it lays right down and is very smooth, feels very firm when up and seems to be of good quality. Has no plastic odor. So many things could be of use for this item not just food but for kids toys as well, Legos, puzzles, I could use 100 more of these.
customer_reviews.author: just bob

customer_reviews.title: If you host or serve at any event,  this is a must have!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bowl one, as well as the plate teir one. Absolutely love them! So kany people want to know where I got them from. Truly the easiest things ever to use ans transport, as well as store! I have used them for Christmas, our annual New Year's Eve party, as well as a baby shower. They have wprled beautifully, washed easily, and folded right up to be put away. Don't hesitate to buy them! I am thinking that a second set might be in order.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome space saver
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so this isn’t some high quality construction, but it fits the bill for what I needed this for - easy to throw snacks and chips in here for a small party or get together, and super easy to collapse and store without taking up a ton of space. It’s plastic, so I would stick to chips and pretzels or other lightweight snacks - probably not a good idea to use as a fruit basket or something heavy like that. I like that it’s reusable so I don’t have to buy one time plastic junk each time I have a party
customer_reviews.author: Marta Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Compact and portable, not sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece's grad party. First, I love that it fold up easily and is so compact/ easy to store. BUT...its just not made to hold anything heavy in the top two tiers. The bottom tier is fine for heavier/ more dense food items but the top two tiers are most certainly not sturdy enough. I purchased this with fruit in mind but that didn't work out because there's no mechanism to lock the bowls into place and it just started to collapse. I ended up using it for veggies on the bottom and 2 different dips in the upper tiers.
customer_reviews.author: Season Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Top bowl doesn't hold dip
customer_reviews.text: You can't put anything "heavy" like dip in the top bowl or it will collapse in on itself. Even marshmallows were to heavy for the middle bowl
customer_reviews.author: Robin Ingersoll

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not so sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice stand for light items. The individual bowls are sturdy and large with an insanely easy setup and breakdown, but the upper levels cannot handle weight. A user can only place lightweight items in the upper bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie A.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it - Slick, Quick & Compact
customer_reviews.text: This is a really slick idea, I purchased it to hold candies during Christmas but it can easily be used for chips or whatever you want. Now it's not fancy, just white plastic bowls, but it's easy to clean and the storage idea is really great, just twisting the top bowl and it collapses! My sister really liked it so I plan on purchasing one for her as a gift. My kiddos thought it was fun too!
customer_reviews.author: Oxrose

customer_reviews.title: MAYBE good for light snacks. Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: I used this for chips and avocado and salsa... i dont know if it was made for a while bowl of avocado but it was not keeping its “legs” straight... not sure what the “legs” are called but it’s the metal lines that holds the bowls on top of each other Instead of keeping the legs straight, it looked like it was about to bend and collapse back down. I was very worried it would do that and end up spilling salsa everywhere I would not buy it again (at least if you plan to use it for heavy duty dips like I did)
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Magliba

customer_reviews.title: Limited use, only for lightweight food in the upper plates
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea that the tray is collapsible, since it is easy to store it, when not needed. However, I did not realise that upper plates will fall down if you put on them a little heavier food. So the use of the tray is very limited. I regret buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing I'm obsessed
customer_reviews.text: It's so fun to open up and collapse. Pretty sturdy but you cant put anything too heavy in it. The bowls look really good quality. Only thing I would note is that the metal looks a little cheap for a fancy party, but you could cover that up with ribbon or something and it's what I expected from the picture anyways.
customer_reviews.author: lickalicalollipop

customer_reviews.title: Convenient food display and easy storage.
customer_reviews.text: I used this for chips and crackers next to dips for a party/Thanksgiving. It was great because the tiers freed up room on the table. It was easy to clean and perfect that it was collapsible and easy to store. My family thought it was a great kitchen “gadget” to have for entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Bre A

customer_reviews.title: I mean, it's awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This thing LEGIT works. I was super skeptical, but it far exceded my expectations. The only negative I could say is that it's not suuuuuuper sturdy. If you are using heavy servingware in it, I'd recommend against it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny S.

customer_reviews.title: worked great for the engagement party
customer_reviews.text: worked great for the engagement party, but not heavy stuff on the top tiers causes it to start to collapse a little
customer_reviews.author: prefersanonymity

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: This product is pretty awesome. Easy to clean, easy to put away, and very functional! It’s definitely worth more than it costs. At least I have found that true so far. I’ve used it for two birthday parties. It’s also a great conversational piece. People love it
customer_reviews.author: Jessica King

customer_reviews.title: Just cool!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cool little gadget. Perfect for parties and easy to store. It's simple in appearance so it goes with any party theme. My kids get so excited when it gets pulled down and they all have to get a turn popping it up. Very cool product.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Great for parties, easy to store! Recommend non-messy foods for cleaning purposes!
customer_reviews.text: Really love these! I ordered two for my son’s party and they were perfect for displaying food options with height! I would recommend putting non-messy foods in this because it was challenging to clean in the sink since the pieces don’t come apart. Easy to fold back up and store until the next party!
customer_reviews.author: Eva Raney

customer_reviews.title: Good for parties
customer_reviews.text: I have storage problems in my cabinets so I thought since this collapsed it would be perfect for me. I needed something with 3 tiers for a party I was having. This worked perfectly. I never had a problem with it collapsing accidentally. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Honest4

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: I like these. I would love them if they locked into place. You are always kind of worried they will collapse. Used them over the holidays and they worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdier than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to set up and use! It was a bit tricky to clean really well because I had salsa in one of the bowls but it is great to be able to store it away and not take up a lot of space in my cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Lorita

customer_reviews.title: As a gift...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my friends as a gift because we always have several snack bowls spilling on the floor when we hang out. I thought it would be lame and weird as a gift but they got. l good laugh and use it every week when we hang out. I would definitely buy more!! It’s sturdy, easy to clean/store, and practical.
customer_reviews.author: Tara O'Rourke

customer_reviews.title: makes serving different snacks easier.
customer_reviews.text: this product eliminated my having to use 3 or 4 different serving bowls for chips and individually wrapped candies when my husband had friends here to watch a ballgame today.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Pechter

customer_reviews.title: Be wary of what you want this to carry!
customer_reviews.text: Got the bowl version hoping it could carry a modest amount of weight like fruits but the top tiers sink down as soon as it is filled up. Not as versatile as I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Mabs

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Good concept. Smaller than expected though and sits lopsided/ crooked. Guess it's an OK buy. Could possibly be made a bit better or cheaper at least for the option given.
customer_reviews.author: cdkz413

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: I really like them. So easy to setup and put away. Wish there are also in different materials. The plastic is hard to clean with there is oil on it.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Poon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to store
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price. I liked the material : plastic (good for backyard parties) but till looks good. I love that it’s collapsible so storing it is easy. Cons: you cannot put something heavy on top shelves because it starts bending/folding a bit. So I put chips/nachos/ popcorn in the middle and grapes/fruits on the bottom shelf and it works just fine
customer_reviews.author: B. Gajic

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to pop up, no directions necessary. Sturdy also! Perfect for any occasion and really simple and cute. Using for my wedding and many more parties to come
customer_reviews.author: Lexi Boomershine

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well at our backyard party. It won't hold heavy items, but it does hold snacks and is a space saver.
customer_reviews.author: I R MCDONALD

customer_reviews.title: You’ll love it!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today and I love it!! Very sturdy especially for the money! Going to use it for a weekend bbq and I’m thinking of ordering another one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super easy set up/clean up
customer_reviews.text: Used two of these as candy holders with various types of candies in each section for a child birthday party. It held up well however I would recommend putting the heaviest items at the base. Super easy to transport, set up, and clean. Several guests commented on how great they were!
customer_reviews.author: J. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Must have for hosting
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It is a must if you like to host parties. It’s a little annoying to clean because you kind of have to dry it separately, but still an amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Nelly

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver.
customer_reviews.text: Omg! I loved these. Made everything look better and they are easy to clean and they store nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Christy McCurry (Radical Reads Book Blog)

customer_reviews.title: Worked great but difficult to clean
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my tea party, everyone loved it, but since it doesn’t come apart it was really difficult to clean in my shallow sink
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Returned a different bowl set and bought this instead..and so glad I did. The size are the bowls are a pretty good size and fits more food than other bowl sets. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Destanee C

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to clean and easy to store!
customer_reviews.text: Worked so well - at first I thought it might collapse but it didn’t. Very easy to clean and easy to collapse to put away.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Find another tiered serving dish
customer_reviews.text: Will collapse when weight is out on the second and third tier. Had to use hot glue to make it hold. Wasn’t bad, but unacceptable
customer_reviews.author: JM7

customer_reviews.title: Loved this item!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it! It was great for the party, it doesn’t topple over but it is a little bouncy when you’re first filling it. Easy to clean and stores easily since it twists into itself.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like this item. It was extremely easy to setup and use. It helped make and keep room in my table for my Mother’s Day brunch items.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Cara

customer_reviews.title: Great ptoduct
customer_reviews.text: I found this by accident looking for a vegetable tray but thought it was quite a clever idea I never thought for the low price that it would’ve been as good as it is it’s very sturdy very cute and great for many different things
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for a full pot luck table where space is at a premium.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Bingham

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap looking - it works - you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Loved this! Great save saver on table and in storing
customer_reviews.text: I loved this little product! Just twist it and fill it with snacks. Sits right in the middle of table without taking up a lot of space
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen Baguiao

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: Major design flaw! Was so excited about this until I actually filled it with chips and dip. As soon as I filled the top with dip, it became top heavy and the entire thing spun back down to the bottom. It would not stay up. Had to scramble to find other bowls to use 15 minutes before the party. This thing went straight in the trash. :(
customer_reviews.author: Caryn Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and compact
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Folds flat so easy to store. Pops up nicely and easy. Great for parties. Very portable and looks are in “good taste”.
customer_reviews.author: Diane B

customer_reviews.text: This comes in handy when hosting something or even a night to yourself . It easily opens and closes which comes in handy when organizing.
customer_reviews.author: me1

customer_reviews.title: This thing was super handy for disbursing and displaying snacks at a conference ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing was super handy for disbursing and displaying snacks at a conference we were selling at. Easy to use and store and clean!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Reasonable price and perfect for holding fruit and other snacks
customer_reviews.author: Toraisa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bowl set for a party
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bowl set for a party, I love that it folds into itself for storage and pops right up when you need it. Saved me table space being stacked too instead of having single bowls laid out on the table. Would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Raygoza

customer_reviews.title: Do not put much weight in them
customer_reviews.text: Don't put too much weight in it as in chips in the bottom or something and dip in the top it's very hard to get it to keep from collapsing

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Is great for a party! Chips, pretzels and three different spots dor dip! Great for holidays!

customer_reviews.title: Compact and stylish
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite purchases. Way nicer than I was expecting. They are sturdy and stylish.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Popped right up and into place, worked like a charm, sturdier than I expected.

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love ther way it pop up and the parts stay attached.. this was very nice and im planning to buy another one

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and space saving
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for party/entertaining! The top one is sectioned into 3 parts. We used it for our baby shower. It’s great because it doesn’t take up a lot of table space. Easy to collapse and clean.

customer_reviews.title: Can't get enough
customer_reviews.text: So easy it's ridiculous. Adds so many more spaces for more snack.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for party food
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition for all of the gatherings we have! And with kids, no fear of anything breaking, because it is plastic! We love that it collapses for space saving storage.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Literally one of the coolest things I’ve ever bought. It worked awesome for a party we had. Saves so much space, both on the counter while serving food and also when storing.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It folds up nicely for storage. Pretty easy to clean. Looks nice.

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price but beware this product is not extremely sturdy. I used it for salsa, guacamole and limes. The guacamole weighed it down a lot. But thankfully it never fell even as many people served themselves.

customer_reviews.title: Trash

customer_reviews.title: Plastic - ok
customer_reviews.text: It does what it’s meant to do. Can’t have heavy food at the the top bc it will collapse, e.g., more than one sliced medium cucumber

customer_reviews.title: Great Serving dish!!
customer_reviews.text: Great serving dish!! Easy to store and clean. Looks cute when displayed. Well worth the money!!

customer_reviews.title: Worked great.

product_meta.title: Collapsible Bowl, 3 Tier - The Decorative Plastic Bowls Twist Down and Fold Inside for Minimal Storage Space. Perfect for Serving Snacks, Salad and Fruit. The Top Bowl is Divided into Three Sections.
product_meta.description: This patented three tiered set of party bowls is a fun and attractive way to serve guests at your next gathering. They are perfect for holding snacks like chips, pretzels and popcorn. Alternatively, fill them with assorted salads and fruits. The top bowl is divided into three sections making it especially suitable for holding a variety of dips, chocolates, nuts or candies. This set is great for any occasion. It’s ideal to use at home for family barbeques and holiday dinners. You’ll want to keep one at work too for business meetings and office parties. Best of all, you don’t need a large area to store this item. The bowls twist down and nest inside each other, so the whole set takes up minimal storage space. When ready to use, simply twist to pop up and create your triple tower of serving bowls. Manufactured from ABS material, these bowls are strong, reliable and made to last. Elegant, yet simple and ideal for any occasion, this three tiered serving piece is a great gift item as well.
feature_bullets: REQUIRES MINIMAL STORAGE SPACE: The plastic bowls twist down and nest in one another making it easy to store.
VARIETY OF USES: These serving bowls are great for holding chips, pretzels, candies, salads, fruits or whatever you’d like to serve.
GREAT FOR ANY OCCASION: Perfect to use at holiday dinners, family barbeques, office parties or any special event.
TOP SECTIONAL BOWL: Top bowl is divided into three sections, making it ideal for serving dips, nuts, chocolates or candies.
STRONG AND DURABLE: These decorative bowls are manufactured from ABS material, making them sturdy and reliable.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars642 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
